pullRequest.body:
I'm investigating how `aesop` is being used (and making comparisons with the in development `grind` tactic), but finding many uses of `aesop` can in fact just be replaced by `simp`.

Hopefully using the simpler tool is both faster, and more readable. We'll see.

nodes.body:
### PR summary [fc678697dd](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/20483/commits/fc678697ddd8a4f18f4f11505c9074b22d3ee287)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ instance {X Y : Action V G} : Zero (X ⟶ Y) := ⟨0, by simp⟩`
`- instance {X Y : Action V G} : Zero (X ⟶ Y) := ⟨0, by aesop_cat⟩`
`-+-+ homMk'_mk_id`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/c0fceb13-e5bb-403a-9e1f-3302c40e22f4) for commit 18fe524ef8c710fba020bcdcc059e19873efead6.
The entire run failed.
Found no significant differences.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/84c0026a-a3ab-4dd6-a58a-5fcbcc60f05f) for commit fc678697ddd8a4f18f4f11505c9074b22d3ee287.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/e3199443-cace-476e-ac14-890abb803d5e/to/84c0026a-a3ab-4dd6-a58a-5fcbcc60f05f) against commit b43248be90578db4b4158698029b1200ab4df641:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                    Metric         Change
  ==================================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Bicategory.FunctorBicategory.Oplax   instructions   -23.8%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Triangulated.Functor                 instructions    -3.5%
```
Can these two simps be merged?

pullRequest.title: chore: replace `aesop` with `simp` where possible
